sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <campaigns/> <description>(Maneuver) When in a starship or vehicle, the character can make a Fire Control maneuver. If he does so, all combat checks from the starship or vehicle count the silhouette of the target as one higher than normal until the beginning of the character's next turn. This effect does not stack with multiple uses of the Fire Control maneuver.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Fire Control</name> <number>TAL0001266</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-12 03:17:02</sys_created_on> <sys_id>fe05efaf2f5ca090e0f497eef699b646</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-12 03:17:02</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
